name: Office Crawl
description:
Today is your usual working day at office. Nothing new. You go to the elevator, and wait, wait, wait, until... Your office not as usual as it was yesturday, all your workers bacame office zombies, they want only mythical "giiiiffftt" from you. Use gun to break floor and kill all of them, drink coffe to be more faster, eat all day long, as you usualy do, to get more power to defeat your co-workers, whos never became normal again.

    Fun game, that was created during two days. It is increadably hard and in some cases event not playble. May lead to irritation and a sense of hopelessness of being, so play in your own responsibility ;)

    Sounds made this game more fun, so recommended to play in headphones. Containes a lot of bugs that want be fixed ¯\(о_о)/¯
